attributes.additional_details: To limit the charges to a pro rata of time overstayed on private car parks , say £1 for every 5 minutes of over stay .
attributes.background: To limit the parking charges on private car parks , example being charged £40 to £70 for overstaying by a few minutes on a private car park.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about prices for parking in private car parks are a matter for the operators, not the Government or Parliament.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
